comment: This professor is super nice and funny. His tests are challenging, but he gives a lot of extra credit opportunities. He is so smart and interesting. I definitely recommend taking him.
This guy is super nice! He's pretty funny too. He's like 80 years old. He gives like 15 extra credit points on tests. take him!
TAKE HIM!!!!! VERY SWEET AND  HELPFUL  TEACHER!!! GIVES A LOT OF EXTRA CREDIT!!!!!

Recommended to anyone who can take notes. Without using the significant extra credit available, it is easy to get an A with ~2 hours of studying per test (assuming you take decent notes). I highly recommend him!

If I were you I would make it to every class that you can. His lectures tend to get a bit off-topic, but pay attention to what he says, read the sections of the book he tells you to and go to the SI sessions and you should be alright. His tests are fairly hard but he gives you many chances to get bonus points. Very interesting and funny guy!

Attendance is mandatory. All lectures are on his test. Take good notes!!! You really don't need the book. I did use the book for very tiny back up info on essays. Professor is nice and funny.  Some tests are 8 pages of essays and some other tests are multiple choice and one essay question (30 to 45 questions).  Extra credit is given.  TAKE HIM!!!!

Don't buy a text book. He uses his own which he posts on vista. I've never taken a course where I didn't have a real textbook to fall back on so it threw me for a bit of a loop. I hate science but his lectures were still interesting. Grades/test fairly easy but not having a text book was odd. Insanely smart and interesting guy!

This class was great, he was very knowledgable about...well, everything, and is hilarious. He doesn't take roll, but if he calls your name and you aren't there, he takes a point off, but that's rare anyway. Tests aren't bad, just go to class & you won't even need the book really.
For either 1101/02 take him. He is great. He is smart, inviting, humorous, and just a  all around good teacher. I hate science but I had a great time in his class. TAKE HIM!

A very intelligent teacher! He knows his stuff and his teaching style is very interesting. His class inspired me to be a better student and got me to some how LOVE science. You will regret not taking his class.

I love this guy! He is brilliant. Doesn't look or act his age. He has a great sense of humor that most of the students don't get. He uses his text but not the assigned one so don't waste your money. He gives a lot of information, but it can be hard to figure out what is important. There is a study session for his class that helps with that though.

Phenomenal teacher! He doesnt teach the boring crap in the textbook. He teaches what he finds interesting, and if super helpful. He assigns a couple papers and gives extra credit opportunities, but really only cares about the quality of your work. He is more than willing to help, and is the 1st science teacher who didn't constantly put me to sleep!

He's pretty random but he does have a sense of humor. The material is pretty easy, but you do have to study. His extra credit is THE BEST and if you work for an A in this class, you can get it. Also the T.A. ROCKS. He's not the best professor ever, but he's certainly not the worst.

He is awful! I feel like he talks about random things everyday. He doesn't teach from the book at all. He acts like he is better than his students because he has a bigger vocabulary. He does not know how to teach at all.

What can I say?.... Horrible. I really felt like he wasnt teaching, just talking about random things that come to mind. However, I did like the fact that he offered Extra Credit. It was really no use to showing up to class because it was no clear way to take notes. Unless you are REALLY familiar with science, I suggest to take someone else!!

Has a good sense of humor, but this is definitely not an easy A class. Attendance is not mandatory, but when you go it is pointless. He gives you no notes and just rambles on the whole class. I made a B but still this class was pointless. Take Prof. Simpson!

I had Aiuto for 1101 as well as 1102 and he's still just as great. His lectures aren't bound to the standard science guidelines. It is apparent that his method of teaching is influenced by the arts. Sometimes his lectures don't seem relevant to the book, but I think that's what makes the class so worthwhile.

He's really funny and he has a pretty easy class. I got a little offended at some of the material in his class strictly because it was a little sacreligious. He is arrogant, but he's probably the best one to choose because not as many people fail his class as other SCI 1101 classes.. he was alright

His class was really easy, all you have to do is follow instructions, read his awesome online text (easy read), and do the extra credit. He curves test and is really helpfull. He is also very funny and nice! If science is not your thing, take his class!

Difficult material, almost pointless to listen to the lecture. Read the book and go to the reviews. Curves exams and provides 30 points extra credit. Provides alternate textbook online which is easier to understand. Would take him again for 1102!
Utilize the discussion board, it might pay off and set you apart from the rest.

OUTSTANDING professor!!! Very intelligent, knowledgeable and quite humorous. Very articulate and but explains himself with scientific terms that some may not be familiar with. He has an extensive vocabulary and uses all of it so some may find him intimidating, but he is a great guy and professor. TAKE HIM!!

I have him now.. Yes you don't have to come to class, but it is far from an easy A. When you do come to class, he's all over the place and barely even talks about science. The tests can be tricky.. but he does curve them and give extra credit.

Very funny and interesting teacher. Good at explaining things and put notes up online. Plus there were a few extra credit assignments based off movies watched in class. You don't have to go to each class, but it's definitely helpful, and entertaining, when you do.

Great teacher!  He doesnt take attendance and he tells you not to buy the book.  Only 3 tests and he gives multiple extra credit assignments.  Sometimes gets off track in his lectures but he is always interesting.  He made it to where I actually wanted to attend to hear his lectures

Mr. Aiuto was surprisingly great. I thought I was going to be bored out of my mind and do poorly in any science class but he was very witty and thought provoking. He included the whole class in discussions. He doesn't take attendance and he doesn't make you buy the book. I recommend going to class because his tests are over what he discusses in cla

Interesting class. Professor Aiuto gives fascinating lectures, and he knows the material well. However, class sessions occasionally seemed as if they had a lack of focus. I can remember leaving his class a few times not feeling sure of what exactly I had learned. Anyway, he's good. I'd recommend taking his class if you have the chance.

Prof. Aiuto is a very knowledgeable man, he knows his science thats for sure.  The class really isn't that easy because there are only 3 tests and that is 100% of your grade.  Since I messed up on one, I got a C.  If you aren't a good test taker, try someone else.  Attendance isnt mandatory and it was somewhat entertaining considering the subject.

He was disorganized. Material was clearly based on this instructor?s personal interests and politics. It was dull, confusing and sometimes offensive. People slept. I was very disappointed. I still have no idea what I have gained other than a grade. Tests were all curved
Loved Professor Auito! He is so smart about what he teaches, and his class wasn't hard at all! I would seriously recommend taking him!
Attend class, take notes... STAY OFF FACEBOOK and you should do fine.  Honestly one of the easiest A's ever!

The best science teacher I have ever had. He explains in great detail so you will have no problem not knowing what to study for. All his tests are multiple choice and the labs are fun and easy. Definitely take him again. Awesome class
AWESOME.
Four labs, three tests, extra credit worth a lot. I never went to class and went into the final with a 100. Posts all the notes online.
EASY EASY EASY! He is extremely smart, and can get off topic A LOT, but if you study the study guide, you will get a good grade. I missed some classes, but still got a good grade. I recommend him!

This professor is great. Really knows his stuff, gives little to no homework, and really makes class fun and interesting. Attendance not mandatory, but it is a class I enjoyed going to every time. Definitely take him!

Love this guy! Hilarious, entertaining discussions, always has interesting things to say. Very intelligent guy who gives lots of opportunities to get an easy A. Fun way of learning through movies, acting, and controversial questions. Attendance not mandatory, but I didn't mind going anyway. Such a relaxing class.
He is a great teacher! Attendence is not manadatory, but worth attending. He is very knowledgable and is humorous too.

He is awesome! He tends to pick on his students some, which makes him seem mean at first but really he is a softy at heart. He has a tendency to be talking about one thing and then jump to something else or quit mid-sentence. Very little of the book is used, so take good notes. Come to class, you'll regret it if you skip too much. Easy A!
Great teacher! Very knowledgable on all sci matters, and lectures are interesting. Gives notes out in class and doesn't take attendace. Don't miss movie days and study for the tests for an easy A.
If you show up for class and take notes like a college student should, then this class is easy. Stop complaining, high school and easy grades are over!
Good, fair, easy if you attend class. Extremely intelligent.  Knows his subject.  Funny guy.
Good, fair, easy if you attend class.
